reviews.review_content:
Clark is a fairly good German instructor.  He's very patient, and never becomes angry/curt or anything with students.  Someimtes, however, i felt like he was taking it a bit too easy with us, and it hurt in terms of learning things like vocabulary. 
In sum, I would definitely take him again
Workload:
Standardized by department - daily homework, one test every two weeks.  essays once in a while. no midterm, yes final.  it is 4 points, but not overwhelming
